title: Now Poppy has her Archenemy
body:
Kled, the Yordle of Noxus, and Poppy, the Yordle of Demacia.

WHO WILL WIN?!

replies.body:
Gonna say Teemo because right now he's the facepalming referee of this match up.

{{champion:17}}: Guys, we're both yordles! How about we calm down and...

{{champion:78}}: OUT OF MY WAY!

Kled: $%#$&% YOU TOO!

{{champion:17}}: *Sighs, facepalming.*
same, i think he would counter her ult
He's not CC immune in that ult last I checked.

Kled doesn't have to beat her. He just has to convert her to Noxus!
http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-QXMJpeaO9OY/VlTE0FcS2nI/AAAAAAAA1Pg/nNnQy1dAsmc/s1600/Poppy_Splash_1.jpg
Oh, look! He already did!
Kled charges in, poppy throws him away.
They're going to be about to kill each other before stepping on a shroom.
I think Kled. Only one reason. 1. ITS ALWAYS A FUCKING 2V1 IN THIS SHIT "1V1S". jk.
